verses.verse: I commend <S%G4921><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> Phoebe, <S%G5402><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> who is <S%G5607><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Cenchreae, <S%G2747><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> you receive <S%G4327><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> in a way worthy <S%G516><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you assist <S%G3936><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> whatever <S%G302><s%> matter <S%G4229><s%> she <S%G846><s%> may need <S%G5535><s%> from you, <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> she <S%G846><s%> herself <S%G3778><s%> also has been <S%G1096><s%> a helper of many, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2532><s%> of my <S%G846><s%> own self. <S%G1700><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4252><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila, <S%G207><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow workers <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G5294><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> laid down <S%G5294><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> necks; <S%G5137><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> give thanks, <S%G2168><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the assemblies <S%G1577><s%> of the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Greet the assembly <S%G1577><s%> that is in <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> Epaenetus, <S%G1866><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the first fruits <S%G536><s%> of Achaia <S%G882><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Andronicus <S%G408><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Junia, <S%G2458><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> relatives <S%G4773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow prisoners, <S%G4869><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> notable <S%G1978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Amplias, <S%G291><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Urbanus, <S%G3773><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellow worker <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Stachys, <S%G4720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved. <S%G27><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Apelles, <S%G559><s%> the approved <S%G1384><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> those who are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the household of Aristobulus. <S%G711><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Herodion, <S%G2267><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kinsman. <S%G4773><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> them <S%G3488><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3488><s%> household of Narcissus, <S%G3488><s%> who are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Tryphaena <S%G5170><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Tryphosa, <S%G5173><s%> who labor <S%G2872><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> Persis, <S%G4069><s%> the beloved, <S%G27><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Rufus, <S%G4504><s%> the chosen <S%G1588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mine. <S%G1700><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Asyncritus, <S%G799><s%> Phlegon, <S%G5393><s%> Hermes, <S%G2060><s%> Patrobas, <S%G3969><s%> Hermas, <S%G2057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> who are with <S%G4862><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Philologus <S%G5378><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Julia, <S%G2456><s%> Nereus <S%G3517><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Olympas, <S%G3652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> who are with <S%G4862><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5370><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%> The assemblies <S%G1577><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beg <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> look <S%G4648><s%> out for those who are causing <S%G4160><s%> the divisions <S%G1370><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> occasions of stumbling, <S%G4625><s%> contrary to <S%G3844><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> learned, <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> turn away <S%G1578><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> those who are such <S%G5108><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> but <S%G235><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> belly; <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> their smooth <S%G5542><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> flattering speech, <S%G2129><s%> they deceive <S%G1818><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the innocent. <S%G172><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> has become known to <S%G1519><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%> I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1909><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> I desire <S%G2309><s%> to have <S%G2309><s%> <S%G1511><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> that which is good, <S%G18><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> innocent <S%G185><s%> in that <S%G1519><s%> which is evil. <S%G2556><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> will <S%G1722><s%> quickly <S%G5034><s%> crush <S%G4937><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%> The grace <S%G5485><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow worker, <S%G4904><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> as do Lucius, <S%G3066><s%> Jason, <S%G2394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sosipater, <S%G4989><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> relatives. <S%G4773><s%>
I, <S%G1473><s%> Tertius, <S%G5060><s%> who write <S%G1125><s%> the letter, <S%G1992><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Gaius, <S%G1050><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> host <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> host of the <S%G1577><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> assembly, <S%G1577><s%> greets you. <S%G5209><s%> Erastus, <S%G2037><s%> the <S%G1577><s%> treasurer <S%G3623><s%> of the city, <S%G4172><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> does Quartus, <S%G2890><s%> the brother. <S%G80><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all! <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
